name: Center for Competition
goal:
Mission of the Center is to create fair competitive environment for business through
enhancing competitiveness of private sector, development of competition culture, and policy advocacy.
Main focus of the Center for Competition is on Small and Medium-sized Enterprises.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Food Safety, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Deep and Comprehensive Free Trade Area Agreement Georgia, Competition policy, Trade
